summary: In a time of starvation, a survivalist lives off a small plot of land hidden deep in forest. When two women seeking food and shelter discover his farm, he finds his existence threatened.
cast: Martin McCann|Mia Goth|Olwen Fouéré|Douglas Russell|Andrew Simpson|Ryan McParland|Hussina Raja|Ciaran Flynn|Sean Doupe|Jeremy Martin|Aran Downey|Logan Kerr|Aaron Goldring|Matthew Henry|Conor Kelly|Michael Og Lane|Caitlin Deeds|Dexter Louca Godfrey|Kieri Kennedy|Barry Ward
title: The Survivalist
